doc.title: Get Smart

credit.role: Control trainee disguised as little old lady
Man in the Pool Parlor/Man in Bus Station
Woman at the Hotel and Control Bank

doc.plot: Maxwell Smart is a bumbling secret agent, assigned by his "Chief" to foil KAOS' latest plans for taking over the world. Invariably, Smart's bumbling detective style lands him in hot water. Lucky for him, his faithful assistant "99" is there to bail him out.
